item.title: Labourer dies on the spot, another seriously injured in granite quarry blast Raichur district
item.description:
<![CDATA[RAICHUR: A labourer was killed on the spot and another was seriously injured in a blast at a granite quarry at Makapur near Lingasugur in Raichur district on Saturday.
The deceased has been identified as Venkatesh (38), from Ilkal in Bagalkot district. Mahaling, a native of Kushtagi in Koppal district, was seriously injured.
